channel.title: Java Heap Space Out Of Memory Error
channel.description:
The current VPS my server is hosted on is 512MB RAM, and I have my server running with -xmx512m, and it seems to crash at least once every 1-3 days with the Heap Space Out Of Memory error..
I am not exactly sure if it used to happen when I was hosted with a 14GB Ram server, and I'm not sure if I want to waste money upgrading my server if it won't help this error.
Is the error coming from my server being 512MB RAM? Or is it something else? Will upgrading it to about 2GB RAM help?
Thanks if you have any info.

item.title: Java Heap Space Out Of Memory Error
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Wow, this thread is…

Anyway, it’s project insanity’s dead lock.

Read full topic

item.title: Java Heap Space Out Of Memory Error
item.dc:creator: @ForeverPkers ForeverPkers
item.description:
@ForeverPkers wrote:

[quote=“xXxSkillerxXx, post:21, topic:411476”][quote author=ForeverPkers link=topic=512732.msg3721566#msg3721566 date=1313970255]

looks like several years hasnt got you anywhere in java.

Looks like 13 years hasn’t got your grammar anywhere.
Nice sig by the way, quite idiotic to put “professional coder” if you still don’t know the difference between “you’re” and “your”.
Java or whatever else you’re a “professional” at coding requires precise spelling, punctuation, and grammar, and you have neither of the 3, so tell me how you’re a “professional” at anything.

Does having a server for several years require me to know Java like the back of my hand? I know it quite well, but even I don’t call myself a professional, nor do I know everything about it, at least I’m not claiming to and I wasn’t asking you to fix it either, was I?

I can rag on you about more of your shit if you want to keep spilling nonsense out of your mouth for no reason. I don’t like kids like you that unintentionally troll and don’t even realize how much of an idiot you look like because you’re too ignorant to realize and admit your childish faults.

Anything else to say?
[/quote]
ROFL If your gonna start beign a fucking smartass bro uhmmm lets be more Precise shall we?:

[quote author=ForeverPkers link=topic=512732.msg3721566#msg3721566 date=1313970255]

looks like several years hasnt got you anywhere in java.

Looks like 13 years hasn’t got your grammar anywhere.
Nice sig by the way, quite idiotic to put “professional coder” if you still don’t know the difference between “you’re” and “your”.
Java or whatever else you’re a “professional” at coding requires precise spelling, punctuation, and grammar, and you have neither of the 3, so tell me how you’re a “professional” at anything.

[indent-you forgot?!@#]Does having a server for several years require me to know Java like the back of my hand? I know it quite well, but even I don’t call myself a professional, nor do I know everything about it, at least I’m not claiming to and I wasn’t asking you to fix it either, was I?

[indent-you forgot?!@#]I can rag on you about more of your shit if you want to keep spilling nonsense out of your mouth for no reason. I don’t like kids like you that unintentionally troll and don’t even realize how much of an idiot you look like because you’re too ignorant to realize and admit your childish faults.

Anything else to say?
[/quote][/quote]

First of all, I was posting on a forum not writing a fucking essay. Tell me if you see anyone indent anything on the internet, even stories or essays or news reports. Why? Because you CAN’T PRESS TAB, you idiot.
Second of all, your server is on a .webs website. The picture in your signature is using 2 quotes that other servers use to advertise, one which is originally used by Near-Reality, I’m not sure what made you think it’s a good idea to steal them.
And lastly, I don’t even need to explain how dumb you are for saying this:
“ROFL If your gonna start beign a fucking smartass bro uhmmm lets be more Precise shall we?:”

I don’t need another kid attempting to bash me on my thread for no reason, especially if you’re THAT dumb.

Read full topic

item.title: Java Heap Space Out Of Memory Error
item.dc:creator: @ForeverPkers ForeverPkers
item.description:
@ForeverPkers wrote:

imsuperman05:

Don’t listen to him. Run your server through Eclipse, and the warnings COULD be memory leaks. Switching to a higher RAM will stop the crashing.

Ah, thanks, I never thought about running it through Eclipse. I’ll try that

Read full topic
